entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h after midnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023
